title: Backend SDE (Django/REST)
text: We seek a Backend Engineer to build and document REST APIs using Python and Django/DRF. Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL), writing performant SQL, containerization with Docker, Linux basics, and Git workflows. Bonus: AWS basics.

title: Data/ML Intern
text: Assist with data wrangling using Python (pandas, numpy), feature engineering, training baseline ML models (scikit-learn), and writing clean, reproducible code. Familiarity with SQL and basic NLP is a plus.

title: Frontend Intern (React)
text: Build UI components in React, integrate REST APIs, manage state, and write basic tests. Understanding of HTML/CSS fundamentals and Git required.
